name: weather-server

scripts.build: npx tsc && npm run copy-gql && npm run copy-html-css && npm run copy-admin-console
scripts.copy-html-css: copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.html build/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.css build/
scripts.copy-admin-console: copyfiles -u 1 src/admin/**/* build/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/admin/**/*.png build/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/admin/**/*.ico build/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/admin/**/*.json build/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/admin/**/*.svg build/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/admin/**/*.js build/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/admin/**/*.txt build/ && copyfiles -u 1 src/admin/**/*.map build/

author: Jakob Schweitzer, Adel Tuncer, Fabio Unterholzer, Paul Strebenitzer
